operations.summary: Get a folder by path or system folder type
operations.notes: Possible system folder types: root, home, other sources, salesforce.

parameters.name: folderParams
parameters.description: Path to folder in the account or the type of system folder to retrieve.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: (ParentFolder): Folder object in which the folder resides. (Documents): The collection of documents contained within the folder. (Folders): The collection of folders contained within the folder. (Path): Full folder path to the folder in the account. (EosParentInfo): Information about the external object storage folder that contains the folder. (Eosinfo): Information about the folder's external object storage properties, if applicable. (ShareLinks): All of the share links that have been created for the folder. (AttributeGroups): Attribute groups saved on the folder. (Security): Permissions set on the folder by role, group, and user.

operations.summary: Get a folder by eosObjectType and eosObjectId

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: (ParentFolder): Folder object in which the folder resides. (Documents): The collection of documents contained within the folder. (Folders): The collection of folders contained within the folder. (Path): Full folder path to the folder in the account. (EosParentInfo): Information about the external object storage folder that contains the folder. (Eosinfo): Information about the folder's external object storage properties, if applicable. (ShareLinks): All of the share links that have been created for the folder. (AttributeGroups): Attribute groups saved on the folder. (Security): Permissions set on the folder by role, group, and user.

operations.notes: To create an EOS folder, supply the EosInfo parameters. To create a regular folder, supply the Name and ParentFolder properties.

operations.summary: Move a folder to the trash folder

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: (ParentFolder): Folder object in which the folder resides. (Documents): The collection of documents contained within the folder. (Folders): The collection of folders contained within the folder. (Path): Full folder path to the folder in the account. (EosParentInfo): Information about the external object storage folder that contains the folder. (Eosinfo): Information about the folder's external object storage properties, if applicable. (ShareLinks): All of the share links that have been created for the folder. (AttributeGroups): Attribute groups saved on the folder. (Security): Permissions set on the folder by role, group, and user.

operations.notes: If AttributeGroups collection is present, any new attribute groups will be added to the folder.
If AttributeGroups collection is present, new attribute groups will be added to the folder and missing attribute groups will be removed.

operations.summary: Get the documents in a folder
Get the folders in a folder
Get the share links of a folder

Path.description: Path of folder in the account

SystemFolder.description: Type of system folder to retrieve. Possibilities: root, home, other sources, salesforce

Name.description: Name of the folder. This property is required to create a non-EOS folder along with ParentFolder. Filterable and sortable

CreatedDate.description: Date and time folder was created. Sortable

CreatedBy.description: Username of user that created the folder. Sortable

UpdatedDate.description: Date and time folder was last updated. Sortable

UpdatedBy.description: Username of user that last updated the folder. Sortable

Description.description: Description of the folder. Filterable and sortable

ParentFolder.description: Folder that contains this folder. Required along with Name when creating a non-EOS folder

BrowseDocumentsUrl.description: Uri where the contents of this folder can be viewed in a browser

AccessLevel.description: Permissions on the folder for the current user

Folders.description: Folders contained within the folder (i.e. subfolders)

Path.description: The file path of the folder within the account's folder structure

AttributeGroups.description: Attribute groups saved on the folder

EosInfo.description: External object storage information for the folder. Used when creating a new EOS folder. Exclude Name and ParentFolder when creating a folder with EOSInfo

EosParentInfo.description: External object storage information for the next EOS object up the tree from this folder. If the folder is contained directly within an EOS object, this is the EOS info for the parent folder

ShareLinks.description: Share links that have been created for the folder

Security.description: Security rules currently defined for the folder

CreateDocumentHref.description: Uri for uploading a document into the folder

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

See.description: If the user can see the object in the folder tree

Read.description: If the user can read the object's content

Write.description: If the user can modify the object's content

Move.description: If the user can move the object

Create.description: If the user can create a child of the object

SetAccess.description: If the user can modify permissions on the object

Href.description: Uri of the current collection. Can be used to retrieve the collection at any time.

Offset.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip when retrieving the collection.

Limit.description: The maximum number of elements retrieved when the collection is retrieved.

First.description: Uri of the first page of the collection.

Previous.description: Uri of the previous page of the collection.

Next.description: Uri of the next page of the collection.

Last.description: Uri of the last page of the collection.

Total.description: Total number of elements in the collection.

Href.description: Uri of the current collection. Can be used to retrieve the collection at any time.

Offset.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip when retrieving the collection.

Next.description: Uri of the next page of the collection.

Last.description: Uri of the last page of the collection.

Path.description: The external object storage path for this object

ObjectId.description: The external object storage identifier for this object

ObjectType.description: The external object storage type for this object

Folder.description: Uri of the folder object corresponding to this external object storage object

Href.description: Uri of the current collection. Can be used to retrieve the collection at any time.

Offset.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip when retrieving the collection.

Limit.description: The maximum number of elements retrieved when the collection is retrieved.

First.description: Uri of the first page of the collection.

Previous.description: Uri of the previous page of the collection.

Next.description: Uri of the next page of the collection.

Last.description: Uri of the last page of the collection.

Total.description: Total number of elements in the collection.

Groups.description: Group-based security specifications. Excludes distribution groups

Name.description: Name of the document. Filterable and sortable

CreatedDate.description: Created date of the document. Sortable

CreatedBy.description: Username of the user that created the document. Sortable

UpdatedDate.description: Last updated date for the document. Sortable

UpdatedBy.description: Username of the user that last updated the document. Sortable

Description.description: Description of the document. Filterable and sortable

Path.description: The file path of the document within the account's folder structure

HistoryItems.description: A history of actions performed on the document

AttributeGroups.description: Attribute groups saved on the document

AccessLevel.description: Permissions on the document for the current user

PageCount.description: The page length of the document

EosParentInfo.description: Information about the external object storage folder that contains the document

Lock.description: The current lock status of the document

Version.description: Version number of the document. Increments as the document is checked out and checked back in

PreviewUrl.description: Uri where a preview of the document can be viewed

ShareLinks.description: Share links that have been created for the document

DocumentProcessTrackingActivities.description: Workflow user steps containing the document

DocumentReminders.description: Document reminders set for the document

DownloadDocumentHref.description: Uri where the document can be downloaded

PdfFileSize.description: PDF rendition of file size in bytes

ContentCreatedDate.description: Date when the document was ingested/uploaded

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

Url.description: Uri of where the shared object can be viewed

ExpirationDate.description: Date and time when the share link expires. Required when creating a new share link (must be set to a future date). Can be in the past when updating a share link. Sortable

AllowNativeDownload.description: Only applies for shared documents. True if the document can be downloaded in native format as part of the terms of being shared. Sortable

AllowPdfDownload.description: Only applies for shared documents. True if the document can be downloaded in PDF format as part of the terms of being shared. Sortable

PreviewBehavior.description: Behavior when user navigates to URL for a shared document (does not apply to a shared folder). Possible values are: Preview, DownloadNative, DownloadPdf, DownloadInline. Filterable and sortable

CreatedBy.description: Username of the user that created the share link

UpdatedBy.description: Username of the user that last updated the share link

CreatedDate.description: Date and time that the share link was created. Sortable

UpdatedDate.description: Date and time that the share link was last updated. Sortable

Folder.description: Folder shared by the share link. Folder or Document is required when creating a new share link, but not both. Will be null if the share link is for a document

Document.description: Document shared by the share link. Document or Folder is required when creating a new share link, but not both. Will be null if the share link is for a folder

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.
Uri of the current collection. Can be used to retrieve the collection at any time.

Offset.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip when retrieving the collection.

Limit.description: The maximum number of elements retrieved when the collection is retrieved.

First.description: Uri of the first page of the collection.

Previous.description: Uri of the previous page of the collection.

Next.description: Uri of the next page of the collection.

Last.description: Uri of the last page of the collection.

Total.description: Total number of elements in the collection.

LockDate.description: When the document was locked. Null if the document is not locked

Type.description: Type of document lock. Possibilities: not checked out, checked out, out for signature

Comment.description: Comment provided by the user when the document was locked

LockOwner.description: The owner of the lock. Null if not locked

CheckInHref.description: If the document is checked out, this is the URI where it can be checked in

SignatureHref.description: If the lock due to a pending signature(s), this is the URI for checking signature status

Last.description: Uri of the last page of the collection.

Offset.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip when retrieving the collection.

Name.description: Name of the group. Required when creating a new group and must have at least one character of any kind except greater than and less than symbols. Filterable and sortable

Description.description: Description of the group. Filterable and sortable

GroupType.description: Type of the group. Possibilities: security and distribution. Required when creating a new group. Filterable and sortable

GroupMembers.description: Users that are members of the group

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

UserName.description: The username associated with the user, used for logging in. Unique identifier for the user. Filterable and sortable

Email.description: Email address belonging to the user. Generally matches the username. Required when creating a new user. Filterable and sortable

FirstName.description: First name of the user. This property required to when creating a new user. Filterable and sortable

LastName.description: Last name of the user. This property required to when creating a new user. Filterable and sortable

Address1.description: Line one of the user's address. Sortable

Address2.description: Line two of the user's address. Sortable

Address3.description: Line three of the user's address. Sortable

City.description: City portion of the user's address. Sortable

State.description: State portion of the user's address. Sortable

ZipCode.description: Zip code portion of the user's address. Sortable

Company.description: The user's company. Filterable and sortable

EnableStartDate.description: Date and time when the user will become enabled in the account. If null, user is not scheduled to be enabled. Sortable

EnableEndDate.description: Date and time when the user will become disabled in the account. If null, user is not scheduled to be disabled. Sortable

ManagedBy.description: The user reports to this user. A user's manager can view things like a user's contacts and work items

ManagedUsers.description: The users managed by this user. A user's manager can view things like a user's contacts and work items

WorkItems.description: Current workflow work items assigned to the user

RecentDocuments.description: The documents most recently accessed by the user

WatchedDocumentsProcessTrackingActivitie.description: The workflow steps that are currently pending (waiting) for all of the documents currently watched by the user

WorkflowQueues.description: The workflow queues that can be accessed by the user

Groups.description: Groups to which the user belongs

SendActivationEmail.description: Used only when creating a new user. Determines whether to send the user an activation email

Role.description: Role of the user in the account. Determines access and privileges in many places. Required property when creating a new user. Possible values are: Guest, LimitedSubscriber, FullSubscriber, UserAdministrator, SuperAdministrator. Filterable

PermissionSets.description: Permission sets that the user is a member of.

Persona.description: Primary security group of the user. Determines access and privileges in several places

PortalOnly.description: If a user is portal only, they are only allowed access through integration with third party systems and not through the main login page

WatchedDocuments.description: The documents currently watched by the user

CreatedDate.description: Created date of the User. Sortable

UpdatedDate.description: Updated date of the User. Sortable

ExemptFromUserSync.description: If a user is exempt from user sync, it will not be updated or deleted by salesforce user sync

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

UserEmail.description: Email address of the user who performed the action represented by the history item. Filterable and Sortable

Action.description: Action represented by the history item. Filterable and sortable

MoreInfo.description: Additional information associated with the history item. Filterable

Comment.description: Comment given when history item was created. Filterable

User.description: User who performed the action represented by the history item. Filterable and Sortable

RelatedDocument.description: Additional document (not the owner of the history item) that is related to the action. e.g. if the document was created by splitting another document, RelatedDocument is the document that was split

CreatedDate.description: Date and time that the action represented by the history item was performed. Sortable

Name.description: The name of the tracking activity

TypeName.description: The type of the tracking activity

Status.description: The status of the tracking activity

Output.description: The decision provided for the tracking activity. e.g. "Approved"

StageName.description: The name of the stage containing this tracking activity

DueDate.description: When the tracking activity is due

ProcessUid.description: The unique identifier for the document process

ProcessName.description: The name of the document process

Document.description: The document to which the process applies

UserActions.description: All user actions for the tracking activity

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

Name.description: Name of the document reminder. Filterable and sortable

ReminderDate.description: Date and time (UTC) that the document reminder is to be executed

RecipientContacts.description: Contacts that will receive the document reminder

RecipientUsers.description: Users that will receive the document reminder

RecipientGroups.description: Groups that will receive the document reminder

RecipientAdHocEmails.description: Ad hoc email addresses that will receive the document reminder

Document.description: The document to which the reminder applies

EmailSubject.description: Subject of the email that gets sent to the document reminder recipients

EmailBody.description: Body of the email that gets sent to the document reminder recipients

EmailFromAddress.description: From email address of the email that gets sent to the document reminder recipients

CreatedDate.description: Created date of the document reminder. Sortable

CreatedBy.description: Username of the user that created the document reminder. Sortable

UpdatedDate.description: Last updated date for the document reminder. Sortable

UpdatedBy.description: Username of the user that last updated the document reminder. Sortable

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

Name.description: Name of the work item. Filterable and sortable

Type.description: Name of the step represented by this work item. Possible values include Approve Documents, Choice, Choose Documents, Choose Users, Edit Documents, and Fill Form. Filterable

Assignee.description: User to whom this work item is assigned

AssignDate.description: Date and time this work item was assigned to a user. Sortable

DueDate.description: Date and time this work item is due. If null, there is no due date. Sortable

Documents.description: Collection of documents associated with this work item

AssigneeInstructions.description: Instructions given by the designer of this workflow to the assignee to complete this work item

Workflow.description: The workflow that contains this work item

Selections.description: List of all possible choices that can be used to complete the work item. Used in combination with the Selected property

Selected.description: Populate this property based on instructions using option(s) from the Selections property to complete the work item

CreatedDate.description: Date and time that the work item was created. Sortable

WorkItemUrl.description: Link to work item in the workflow inbox.

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.
Uri of the current collection. Can be used to retrieve the collection at any time.

Offset.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip when retrieving the collection.

Limit.description: The maximum number of elements retrieved when the collection is retrieved.

First.description: Uri of the first page of the collection.

Previous.description: Uri of the previous page of the collection.

Next.description: Uri of the next page of the collection.

Last.description: Uri of the last page of the collection.

Total.description: Total number of elements in the collection.

Offset.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip when retrieving the collection.

Name.description: The name of the workflow as given in the workflow designer. Required when starting a new workflow

StartDate.description: Date and time the workflow was started

EndDate.description: Date and time the workflow ended. Null if the workflow has not yet ended

Status.description: Status of the workflow. Possible values include: Execution Pending, Executing, Waiting, Completed, Paused, Failed, Aborted

Info.description: Additional information associated with the workflow

Params.description: XML data used when starting the workflow. Only used when starting a new workflow

WorkflowDocuments.description: Documents passed when starting a workflow. Only used when starting a new workflow

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

Items.description: List of options that can be selected when completing a work item. Type of the options varies with the type of workflow step

Comment.description: Comment made by the user when completing a work item. Used only when populating the Selected property of a work item

Allowed.description: Determines the number of selections that can be made. Possible values include One, OneOrMore, and ZeroOrMore

Name.description: The name of the workflow queue. Filterable and sortable

Description.description: Description of the queue. Filterable and sortable

CreatedDate.description: Date and time that the workflow queue was created. Sortable

UpdatedDate.description: Date and time that the workflow queue was last updated. Sortable

WorkItems.description: All work items that are currently assigned to the workflow queue

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

Permissions.description: List of permission names. Maps to Enum.PrivilegeTypes

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

AssignedTo.description: User assigned to the tracking activity.

WorkflowQueue.description: WorkflowQueue of allowable users assigned for the tracking activity.

Output.description: The decision provided by the user for the tracking activity. e.g. "Approved"

Comments.description: Additional comments provided by user at time of completion

ActionBy.description: User who took action on the activity. Action can be Reassigning, Unassigning, completing the activity.

StartDate.description: When user starts the tracking activity

UpdatedDate.description: When user starts the tracking activity

EndDate.description: When user ends the tracking activity

Email.description: Email address of the contact. Filterable and sortable

FirstName.description: First name of the contact. This property is required when creating a new contact. Filterable and sortable

LastName.description: Last name of the contact. This property is required when creating a new contact. Filterable and sortable

Address1.description: Line one of the contact's address. Sortable

Address2.description: Line two of the contact's address. Sortable

Address3.description: Line three of the contact's address. Sortable

Company.description: The contact's company. Filterable and sortable

Shared.description: True if the contact is shared, false if it is private and viewable only by its owner

Groups.description: The distribution groups of which the contact is a member

Href.description: Uri where the object can be retrieved.

Offset.description: The number of objects at the beginning of the collection to skip

Limit.description: The number of objects per page

SortProperty.description: The property of the collection object on which to sort

SortDirection.description: ASC for ascending. DESC for descending

Filter.description: The property of the collection object on which to filter

FilterExact.description: If true, filtering will perform an exact match instead of the default contains match

CaseInsensitive.description: If FilterExact is true and this is true, filtering will perform an exact match but will ignore case
